text: In some ways it will be a testing occasion for him, although some think his position unassailable simply because there is no one else in sight to supplant him. So the conference will concentrate on laying the foundations on which to win the next election. The rally comes at a time when in spite of carefully worded statements by the Prime Minister there is an air of electoral expectancy.
handwritten_text: In some ways it will be a testing occasion for him, although some think his position unassailable simply because there is no one else in sight to supplant him. So the conference will concentrate on laying the foundations on which to win the next election. The rally comes at a time when in spite of carefully worded statements by the Prime Minister there is an air of electoral expectancy.
